channel.title: DJ Ricker Dance Mechanic
channel.description: Tune in weekly for floor filling electronic Dance Mixes
channel.itunes:subtitle: Dance Music Specialist
channel.itunes:author: RICKER
channel.itunes:summary: Tune in weekly for floor filling electronic Dance Mixes

item.title: Ricker - Dance Mechanic 22
item.description: Keep it moving! Bangin set, hope you enjoy. Drop me a comment! DM22 Tracklist: 1. Housequake - Out of the dark (The cube guys dub) 2. Ben DJ - Music of life (Lissat & Voltaxx dub tool mix) 3. Sergio Fernandez - and ismael Rivas - Safir (Evan Burke RMX) 4. 2 Elements - Speed Feat. Miss Bunty - (Stefano Noferini RMX) 5. Stephan Luke - Body Talk 6 .Adele - Rolling in the deep (Ponk RMX) 7. Alex Kenji - Something Else 8. Firebeatz - Where brooklyn at 9. Marco V - Rock the boat (Please Island 2011) 10. Oscar L and Coqui Selection - To say to you 11. The Subs - Dont stop (BeataCue RMX) 12. Spankox - Michael Jackson is not dead (Ago & Highpass RMX) 13. DirtyLoud - Disco Records (Alex Mind RMX) 14. Frederick Olufsen - Basement Insomnia (Fast Foot RMX) 15. Maverickz - Pandi Panda (Andrea Bertolini RMX) 16. Sander Van Doorn VS. Afrojack & R3hab - Koko Prutata (First State Bashup) www.djricker.podomatic.com and facebook.com/djricker
item.dc:creator: RICKER

item.title: Ricker - Dance Mechanic 21
item.description: Thanks for tuning in, Dance Mechanic has now reached 9,000 worldwide subscribers with approx 200 daily downloads. been busy in the studio on production work but will try to bring you new inspiration at least once a month. Podcast direct site is www.djricker.podomatic.com DM21 TRACKLIST: 1.Emil Croff - This is my house (Dub Mix) 2.Timmy & Tommy feat. Leila - Perfect Motion (Lish RMX) 3.Boogie Pimps feat. Darryl Pandy - Knocking (Tujamo RMX) 4.John Acquaviva, Mauel De La Mare, Luigi Rocca - Shaken not slurred 5.Jordy Lishous - Raw 2011 (JL Dope Mix) 6.Tristan Garner & Gregori Klosman - Bounce 7.Mert Hakan feat. Terri B! - Disco Friends (Kurd Maverick RMX) 8.Richard Dinsdale - What I Do 9.Third Party - Duel 10.The Nycer - Turbo 11.Tim Mason - The Moment (Steve Angello Edit) 12.Boys will be boys - We Rock 13.Felguk - All night long (Darth & Vader RMX) 14.Roy Davis Jr.Feat. J. Noize, Kaye Fox - Enjoy the ride (James talk, Ridney RMX) 15.Phunk Investigation - 1980 16.Filterfreakz - Everything Explained

item.title: Ricker - Dance Mechanic 20
item.description: Here is a new mix i just whipped up for my 20 version in the Dance Mechanic series which has now reached 2,000 world wide subscribers. Been taking time on producing my own records so the podcast has not been updated as much but thanks for tuning in and please leave any feedback. One love.... 1. Stephan Luke - Pressure 2. Kurd MAverick - Warum Nisht! Chili Pepper (David Puentez Miami WMC Mash) 3. Gimbal & Sinan - Body Spray 4. Allan Zax - Two Things (Deep Josh Remix) 5. Wally Lopez - American People 6. Redondo - Foxy 7. Dirty House Bastards - Charlie Sheen (Sebas Marin Remix) 8. Scooter & Lavelle ft. Sue Cho - Beats inside my head (Donald Glaude & Revolvr Remix) 9. Zedd - Autonomy (Lucky Date remix) 10. Miles Dyson - Itune 11. UMEK - OMGWTF 12. Perfect Stranger - A mosquito bit my leg 13. Javi Mula ft. Re-leese - JET Set (instrumental Mix) 14, Serhio Vegas - Papa Dance 15. Niels van gogh vs Daniel Strauss - Emergency (Manuel De La Mare Remix)

item.title: Ricker - Dance Mechanic 19
item.description: Happy New Year to all of you! Thanks for downloading and subscribing to my Dance Mechanic Podcast. I have a show coming up this Saturday 1/08/11 @ Sway Lounge in San Diego. My new years resolution is to keep working hard in the studio on my own productions and remixes and of course continue banging out this podcast. One love... 1. Luciana & Static Avenger - I like that (Thomas Gold Dub) 2. Voltereto - Touch Me (Pure Vocal Mix) 3. Chris Lake - Running Out (Mind Electric RMX) 4. Dirty Impact Vs. Royal XTC - Tom's Diner (Lissat & Voltaxx RMX) 5. DJ Disciple & Charlie Victor - Return to earth (Erick Deck's Lonely Dub) 6. Markus Binapfl aka BIG World - Oh No! (Lucas Reyes & Rio Dela Duna RMX) 7. Nightriders - Hey (Marco Lys Re-Edit) 8. Federico Scavo - Let's all chant 9. Soundshaperz - Cocaine 10. Swanky Tunes & Hard Rock Sofa - Rhea 11. Stefano Noferini - Bad Davis 12. Manuel De La Mare - Talamanca 13. D-Jastic - Up to no good (Extended Mix) 14. DJ Jesus Luz, Twice Nice & Ronen Dahan - What is limit (Bastian Van Shield RMX) 15. Spencer & Hill Feat. Lil John - Less Go! (Porter Robinson RMX) 16. Andrew Bennett - Adagio for strings

item.title: Ricker - Dance Mechanic 18
item.description: 3 Months to cook this shit up, one of the longest breaks between sets. Gotta find that inspiration ya know...Dirty and Filthy...if you go to Church this may not be for you! 1. Albin Myers - Bit This (Original Mix) 2. Tom Novy - Now or never - Lissat & Voltaxx Remix) 3. David Amo & Julio Navas - Baby (original Mix) 4. Dani L. Mebius - Synth and strings (original Mix) 5. RLP & Barbara Tucker - R.E.S.P.E.C.T (Club edit) 6. Nick & Danny Chatelain - Rumba (Ralvero for the floor remix) 7. Jesse Garcia - Work This Pussy (Marcos Rodriguez remix) 8. Keewix feat, Messinian - Mariachi Loco (Denzel Park Vocal Mix) 9. Grooveyard - Mary Go Wild (Nicky Romero remix) 10. Nick Galea & Mark Dynamix - I Gotcha (Min Electric remix) 11. Steve Smooth - Party People (Original Mix) 12. Duck Sauce - Barbara Streisand (Nick Thayer remix) 13. Chuckie & Gregori Klosman - Mutfakta (Original Mix) 14. Tom Piper & Tommy Trash - All My Friends (MyBack remix) 15. Antranig - Wont stop rocking (Original Mix) 16. Spencer & Hill - Dub Disco (Lucky Date remix)

item.title: DJ Ricker - Dance Mechanic 17
item.description: Just the way you like it :-) 1. I-Vision & Gilbert AM - Playback 2. Zoo Brazil feat. Rasmus Kellerman - There is hope (Daniel Kandi's Progressive mix) 3. Mathias Moor - Elysium (Deluna Remix) 4. Nevesid - Lonliness (Grave Remix) 5. Dave Horne - For so long 6. Jonas Steur feat. Julie Thompson - Side by side (Orjan Nilsen Remix) 7. Dave Deen - Journeyman (ReOrder Remix) 8. RVM - Everytime (Tamerlan & Djons Remix) 9. Juventa - Just an emotion 10. Abstract Vision & Elite electronic - Cyclone 11. Ben Nicky & Mark Eteson - Altitude 12. Paul Trainer - Overflow 13. W&W - Alpha

item.title: DJ Ricker - Dance Mechanic 16
item.description: This new mix is something ive been wanting to do for a while, I live in San Diego and while this type of music is not generally welcome here (because its not commercial), its something that Ive always loved and have been thinking of cooking up for a while. Starts off slow and then really picks up towards the end, Hope you enjoy it... 1. Baja California - Ondas Silenciosas (Extended Dream) 2. Aleksey Yaklovev - Caribbean Sea (Jeff Montalvo Summerland Remix) 3. Udgata Anagh pres. Harmonic Surprise - Beyond the shores 4. Mark Koster - Yuruna 5. Crimson - Targus (Vitodito Prog Mix) 6. PHATT - Not Today 7. AVSR Pres. Ailuronyx - So far away (Sunshize Remix) 8. Paul Webster - High Voltage (Jordan Suckley Remix) 9. The Airstatic - Woldwide (D-Mad Remix) 10. Myon & Shane 54 Feat. Labworks - Ibiza Sunrise 11. Luigi Lusini - Big Bang 12. Onova - Timotej 13. Des McMahon - Come closer

item.title: DJ Ricker - Dance Mechanic 15
item.description: Subliminal Balearic for the careful listener...catch the transmissions.. 1. Moonrise on the beach Feat. York - Dream Man Club Mix 2. Sovve - Some other day - Thomas Cresine remix 3. Groove Mafia - Alone in love 4. Niklas Grosswald - Moog 5. Santerna Feat. Marcie - Finding Happiness (Beatservice Sundown Remix) 6. Yura Moonlight - Dream of you 7. George Acosta - Meridian 8. John O'bir - Out of touch 9. Khashassi & Marco V - Scenario (Daniel Portman remix) 10. Ummet Ozcan - Vimana

item.title: DJ Ricker - Dance Mechanic 14
item.description: A lot different than previous releases, short and sweet. Starts slow and then punches you in the face! Dance Mayhem, feel it! 1. Alpha 9 - Come home (Original Mix) 2. Intersonic & peter Knife - The 3 Colos (Original Mix) 3. Tucandeo - Far from reality (Original Mix) 4. Carlo calabro - Rude Dude (George Acosta Remix) 5. D-Mad - She gave happiness (Arty Remix) 6. Marlo - Superlift (Original Mix) 7. Eximinds - Spring Awakening (Original Mix) 8. Lange - Harmonic Motion (Original Mix) 9. Tasadi & Nhato - Time ticks away (Original Mix) 10. Greg Downey - Send the gods (Original Mix)

D-Mad - She gave happiness (Arty Remix) 6. Marlo - Superlift (Original Mix) 7. Eximinds - Spring Awakening (Original Mix) 8. Lange - Harmonic Motion (Original Mix) 9. item.title: DJ Ricker- Dance Mechanic 13
item.description: A little bit of everything for everyone as usual, in my opinion my best mix so far, flows nicely almost perfect :) 1. La Fuente - Guitarra 2. Edward Maya - Stereo Love (Adi Perez Remix) 3. Shakira - Waka Waka (Esto es Africa) (Alex Barrera remix) 4. Enrique Iglesias Feat. Pitbull - I like it (Avicii Remix) 5. Alexdoparis & Swoop - Rain Star ( Pierre M Remix) 6. Jason Derulo - Ridin Solo (Jump Smokers Remix) 7. Travie Mccoy - Billionaire (Fifth Column V Remix) 8. Benny Benassi - Spaceship (Fedde LE Grande Remix) 9. Sergio Ramos - Be Loved (Dave Darrell Remix) 10. Justice vs. Simian - We are your friends (Chris Moody Remix) 11. Haley vs. Deadmau5 - Falling in love with Brazil (Kaskade Remix) 12. Adrian Lux - Tennage Crime (Axwell Remix) 13. Prok & Fitch - Walk With Me (Daddy's Groove Remix) 14. Red Carpet Feat. Hardwell - Alright 2010 (Originial Mix)

item.title: DJ Ricker - Dance Mechanic 12
item.description: Bit of commercial house followed by progressive and bangin electro

item.title: DJ Ricker - Dance Mechanic 10
item.description: Check out my latest Mix Dance Mechanic 10. This is a mix filled with house, electro and some soft trance. Definitely a little bit of something for everyone. Please feel free to comment and add my at myspace.com/djricker1 or facebook.com/djricker I am from the San Diego so hit me up if your ever in the area. Thanks for listening!
